derivation: from G1 (ἄπιστος) (as a negative particle) and G4103 (ἄπιστος);
kjv_def: that believeth not, faithless, incredible thing, infidel, unbeliever(-ing)
strongs_def: (actively) disbelieving, i.e. without Christian faith (specially, a heathen); (passively) untrustworthy (person), or incredible (thing)
outline:
1. unfaithful, faithless, (not to be trusted, perfidious)
  2. incredible
    1. of things
  3. unbelieving, incredulous
    1. without trust (in God)
